headline.print_headline: UN Ebola Coordinator to Visit West Africa
headline.main: UN Ebola Coordinator to Visit West Africa

lead_paragraph: The public health expert coordinating U.N. efforts to fight Ebola said on Tuesday that he's heading to Washington and then to West Africa to determine the best ways the world body can support people, communities and governments affected by the deadly disease.
